definition: for the first time/first (meeting, attempt etc)
next in sequence/second/the second (day, time etc)/secondary/vice-/sub-/infra-/inferior quality/substandard/order/sequence/hypo- (chemistry)/classifier for enumerated events: time

sentences.chinese: 左外鋒，17歲就爲曼聯初次登場。

sentences.english: Right now I feel like Romeo when he first saw Julieta.
sentences.chinese: 眼前，我有了羅密歐初次遇見朱麗葉的那種感覺。

sentences.english: Will the first to use contraceptives, "Yasmin", can reduce the dose of their own?
sentences.chinese: 請問初次用避孕藥“優思明”，可否自行減小劑量？

sentences.english: Today's dinner is my husband cooks first time.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的晚餐是我丈夫初次掌廚的成果。

sentences.english: The team was flushed with its first victory.
sentences.chinese: 這個隊因初次勝利而感振奮。

sentences.english: If at first you don't succeed try again.
sentences.chinese: 茹果初次不成功，就要一試再試。

sentences.english: The singer made his debut as Mozart's Don Giovanni.
sentences.chinese: 這位歌唱家初次登臺表演莫札特的唐喬凡尼。

sentences.english: Tonight's dinner is my husband's debut as a cook.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的晚餐是我丈夫初次掌廚的成果。

sentences.english: Hillary Clinton's returns from Asia having made a first-class debut.
sentences.chinese: 希拉里在亞洲展現了第一流的初次亮相。

sentences.english: On that day, due to Yihe's introduction, I firstly met Haizi.
sentences.chinese: 那一天，因駱一禾引見，我與海子初次相識。

sentences.english: The fledglings were amazing to watch as they tried to fly for the first time.
sentences.chinese: 那些剛長羽毛的小鳥初次飛行的樣子令人歎爲觀止。

sentences.english: Yeah. So what was your initial meeting like?
sentences.chinese: 是的，那麼你們初次見面是怎樣的情景呢？

sentences.english: You gave me hyacinths first a year ago;
sentences.chinese: 一年前你把風信子初次給我作爲獎賞。

sentences.english: No; he never saw him till the other morning at Meryton.
sentences.chinese: 不認識，那天上午在麥裏屯他還是初次和他見面。

sentences.english: Ill meet him where I first met you.
sentences.chinese: 我將在初次見你的地方與他會面。

sentences.english: Saccharin, the oldest artificial sweetener, was first produced in 1879.
sentences.chinese: 糖精，最古老的甜味劑，於1879年初次生產。

definition: second (i.e. number two)/second time/twice/(math.) quadratic (of degree two)
not yet/did not/have not/not/8th earthly branch: 1-3 p.m., 6th solar month (7th July-6th August), year of the Sheep/ancient Chinese compass point: 210°
